mvp1Features.description: Account deletion, data retention (30 days), and purging compliance

epics.name: FileUploadIngestion

mvp1Features.notes: v3.0 - Documentation Standards optimization with AI field mapping

mvp1Features.name: ProgressTrackingNotification
mvp1Features.description: Real-time progress tracking and email notifications
mvp1Features.notes: v1.2 - Complete progress tracking with dashboard and notifications

mvp2Features.name: IdentifiedFileUpload

epics.name: DataQualityScoring
epics.description: Comprehensive analysis and scoring of data quality issues
epics.notes: Epic v1.2 completed - Error detection and scoring dashboard

mvp1Features.name: ScoringBreakdown
mvp1Features.description: Detailed scoring dashboard with error categorization
mvp1Features.notes: Comprehensive dashboard with four-category error taxonomy and cost breakdown

mvp1Features.name: CostCalculator
mvp1Features.description: Business cost calculation for data quality issues
mvp1Features.notes: Complete cost impact analysis with industry benchmarks

epics.name: AutomatedCorrection
epics.description: AI-powered automatic correction of common data quality issues
epics.notes: Epic completed - AI correction engine foundation

mvp2Features.name: CorrectionEngine
mvp2Features.notes: AI correction engine with confidence scoring and validation

epics.name: CorrectionReviewManagement
epics.description: User interface for reviewing and approving AI-generated corrections
epics.notes: Epic completed - Complete correction review workflow with toggle interface and transparency

mvp2Features.name: FixReviewInterface
mvp2Features.description: Interactive interface for reviewing and selecting corrections with toggle controls
mvp2Features.notes: v1.1 - Complete toggle interface with "Apply fix" labels, error category chips, and record-level overrides

mvp2Features.name: FixResults
mvp2Features.description: Post-correction summary with complete error transparency and download options
mvp2Features.notes: v1.2 - Complete error breakdown cards, deselected records table, and dynamic metrics based on user selections

epics.name: ManualReviewManagement
epics.description: Tools for manual correction of complex data quality issues

epics.name: FileExportDelivery
